title: Sadko and the Sea Kingdom
description: In Sadko and the Sea Kingdom, Sadko is faced with many difficult decisions. Will he choose to save his village or marry the daughter of the Sea King? Colorful illustrations enrich the magical folktale. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify narrative point of view as well as retell to better understand the story.
meta: churned, disobey, flooded, gusli, lowly, strumming
Narrative Point of View : Identify narrative point of view
